feature_requests.title: [Feature]: Fix Critical Non-Functional Core Features
feature_requests.problem_statement: Multiple core features are completely non-functional in the current system. The 'Add Member' button, campaign creation, course creation, event workflow, report execution, and member portal login are all broken. This blocks all user workflows and makes the system unusable.
feature_requests.proposed_solution: Systematically repair each broken feature by debugging frontend event handlers, verifying backend endpoints, testing workflows end-to-end, and implementing proper error handling and user feedback.

expected_impact.severity: Critical - System is unusable without these fixes

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix Add Member Button
sub_issues.description: The Add Member button doesn't work at all. Need to verify the onClick handler is attached, check if the API endpoint exists, ensure the modal component loads, and add proper form validation and error handling so admins can actually add new members to the system.
tasks: Verify onClick handler is attached to Add Member button
Check if the API endpoint exists and is functional
Ensure the modal component loads correctly
Implement error handling and user feedback

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix New Campaign Creation
sub_issues.description: Campaign creation workflow is completely broken. Need to verify the campaign form component exists, check routing is configured, ensure the API endpoint works, implement the rich text editor for email content, and add proper validation so marketing teams can create email campaigns.
tasks: Implement rich text editor for email content

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix Create Course Button
sub_issues.description: Create Course button is non-functional. Need to build the course creation wizard, implement file upload for course materials, add the rich text editor for descriptions, create the module/lesson structure, and enable draft saving so admins can add new courses to the learning platform.
tasks: Implement file upload for course materials
Add rich text editor for descriptions

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix Course Preview
sub_issues.description: Course preview doesn't display anything. Need to create the preview component, implement video player for lessons, add PDF viewer for documents, show course outline and metadata, and ensure the preview works so members can see course content before enrolling.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Implement Member Portal Login
sub_issues.description: There's no login mechanism at all for the member portal. Need to build the login page, implement authentication with JWT tokens, create password reset workflow, add session management, implement rate limiting for security, and create the member dashboard landing page.
tasks: Build the login page with form validation
Add proper error handling and feedback

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix Event Creation Workflow
sub_issues.description: Event creation is broken. Need to build the event creation form with all fields (date/time, location, virtual options, registration settings, pricing), implement the rich text editor for descriptions, add image upload for event banners, and enable event publishing so admins can create conferences and meetings.
tasks: Build event creation form with all required fields
Add rich text editor for descriptions
Implement image upload for event banners

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix Run Report Functionality
sub_issues.description: The Run Report button doesn't execute reports. Need to fix the report execution engine, implement parameter selection UI, add report preview, enable CSV/Excel/PDF exports, implement progress indicators for large reports, and add scheduled report delivery.
tasks: Implement progress indicators for large reports

feature_requests.title: [Feature]: Comprehensive Chapter Management Improvements
feature_requests.problem_statement: Chapter management is limited to grid view only. Cannot create or edit chapters outside the grid, no bulk operations, no hierarchy visualization, and no comparison tools. This severely constrains administrative efficiency.
feature_requests.proposed_solution: Create dedicated chapter creation/editing interfaces, implement bulk operations, build visual hierarchy tree showing national→state→chapter relationships, add enhanced chapter cards with metrics and sparklines, and create comparison tools.

expected_impact.users_affected: National admins, state admins, chapter leaders

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Chapter Creation Form Outside Grid
sub_issues.description: Create a dedicated 'Create Chapter' page with full form including basic info, location, contact details, leadership assignments, and branding. Also add a quick-create modal option for simple chapters.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Enable Chapter Editing Outside Grid
sub_issues.description: Build both a quick-edit modal for minor changes and a full-page editor with tabbed interface for comprehensive updates. Add change tracking, version history, and a 'Duplicate Chapter' feature.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Bulk Chapter Operations
sub_issues.description: Add checkboxes to chapter list, create bulk action toolbar, and implement operations like bulk status changes, bulk delete, bulk assignment of leaders, bulk export, and bulk messaging to chapter leaders.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Implement Chapter Hierarchy Visualization
sub_issues.description: Create an interactive tree view showing National → State → Chapter relationships. Use expand/collapse nodes, show member counts at each level, add drag-and-drop for reorganization.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Make Chapter Card Metrics Clickable
sub_issues.description: Convert all metrics on chapter cards (member count, event count, revenue) into clickable links that drill down to detailed views.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Sparkline Graphs to Chapter Cards
sub_issues.description: Add small trend graphs (sparklines) to each chapter card showing member growth, event attendance trends, and revenue over the last 12 months.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Quick Action Buttons on Chapter Card Hover
sub_issues.description: When hovering over a chapter card, show quick action buttons for Edit, View Details, Message Leaders, and Export Data.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Show Comparative Performance Indicators
sub_issues.description: Display how each chapter compares to state average and national average for key metrics. Show indicators like '+25% vs state avg' and color-code performance.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Chapter Data Export Option
sub_issues.description: Add export button to individual chapter cards and detail pages. Allow exporting chapter data to CSV, Excel, or PDF format.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Enable Chapter Comparison View
sub_issues.description: Build a side-by-side comparison interface where admins can select 2-5 chapters and see all metrics compared in a table.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Fix Inconsistent Performance Indicators
sub_issues.description: Standardize the color coding across all chapter displays. Use consistent colors for statuses and ensure all performance badges follow the same design pattern.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Context to Top Performer Section
sub_issues.description: Add context like time period, comparison baseline, specific metric that made them top performer, and show runner-up chapters.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Show Contact Details in Chapter Section
sub_issues.description: Display primary contact name, email, and phone number directly in the chapter listing and cards.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Implement Chapter Comparison Tools
sub_issues.description: Build filtering and sorting tools for chapter comparison. Allow filtering by state, size, performance level, and sorting by any metric.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Direct Messaging to Chapter Leaders
sub_issues.description: Add 'Message Leader' button that opens email compose or internal messaging directly to chapter president/contact.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Action Buttons to Hierarchy Table
sub_issues.description: In the chapter hierarchy table view, add action buttons to each row for common tasks like Edit, View Members, View Events, View Financials, and Message Leaders.

feature_requests.title: [Feature]: Implement Comprehensive RBAC with Hierarchical Permissions
feature_requests.problem_statement: The system has zero role-based access control. All users see the same interface regardless of role. This creates security risks, compliance violations, cluttered UX, and prevents proper administrative delegation.
feature_requests.proposed_solution: Implement four-tier RBAC system: Member view (limited access), Chapter Admin view (chapter-specific), State Admin view (state-wide), and National Admin view (full access). Include permission management interface and audit logging.

expected_impact.priority: High - Critical for security and compliance
expected_impact.benefit: Enables proper data segregation and delegation

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Implement Member View
sub_issues.description: Create simplified interface for standard members showing only personal profile, event registration, course enrollment, and member directory. Hide all administrative functions.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Create Chapter Admin View
sub_issues.description: Build interface for chapter leaders showing their chapter's member list, events, finances, and reports. Allow them to manage only their chapter's data.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Build State Admin View
sub_issues.description: Create state-level administrator interface with access to all chapters within their state, state-wide reporting, cross-chapter analytics, and ability to approve chapter requests.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Design National Admin View
sub_issues.description: Build full system access interface for national staff including all states, all chapters, system configuration, user management, integration settings, and organization-wide reporting.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Permission Management Interface
sub_issues.description: Create admin interface for assigning and revoking roles. Include user search, role assignment workflow, permission preview, temporary role elevation, and bulk role assignment.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Create Role Assignment Workflow
sub_issues.description: Implement approval workflow for role assignments. Route requests to appropriate approver, send notification, track approval status, and log all changes.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Implement GDPR Compliance Tools
sub_issues.description: Add right to be forgotten (data deletion), data export for user requests, consent tracking, data retention policies, and privacy preference center.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Build Audit Log Viewer
sub_issues.description: Create interface for viewing all permission changes, role assignments, access attempts, and administrative actions. Include filtering and export capabilities.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add IP Restriction Settings
sub_issues.description: Allow setting IP address restrictions per role or user. For example, only allow national admin access from office IP addresses.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Implement Session Management
sub_issues.description: Build ability to view all active user sessions, force logout of specific users or sessions, see login history, set session timeout periods, and detect concurrent login attempts.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Configure Data Retention Policies
sub_issues.description: Create interface for setting how long different types of data are retained. For example, keep member data for 7 years, event data for 5 years, per legal requirements.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Create Privacy Preference Center
sub_issues.description: Build member-facing interface where users can control privacy settings, opt in/out of communications, control data sharing, and manage consent preferences.

sub_issues.title: [Sub-Issue]: Add Terms Acceptance Tracking
sub_issues.description: Implement system to track when users accept terms of service, privacy policy, and other agreements. Show version history and require re-acceptance when terms change.

administrative-workflow-agent.description: Implements administrative workflows including RBAC permissions, approval processes, bulk operations, and audit logging

dashboard-analytics-engineer.description: Builds data visualization dashboards with interactive analytics, real-time updates, and export capabilities

data-management-export-agent.description: Implements advanced data filtering, search, sorting, and export functionality

feature-completion-specialist.description: Transforms incomplete features into production-ready implementations

form-validation-architect.description: Establishes comprehensive form validation architecture using React Hook Form and Zod

integration-api-specialist.description: Establishes scalable API integration architecture for external services

navigation-accessibility-agent.description: Ensures WCAG 2.1 AA compliance through keyboard navigation, focus management, ARIA attributes

notification-communication-agent.description: Implements comprehensive notification system with real-time updates

react-component-architect.description: React 19 component architecture specialist for scalable, accessible components
